name: Child Care Health Program (CCHP)
description: The mission of the California Childcare Health Program is to improve the quality of child care by initiating and strengthening linkages between the health, safety, and child care communities and the families they serve. Providers Resources: - Wildfire Resources - Managing Diabetes in Child Care Programs - Incidental Medical Services in Child Care - Safe Infant Sleep Parents Resource: - COVID-19 Vaccine Frequently Asked Questions (updated October 2023) - RSV in the Child Care Setting - Safer Clea
